extension.description: The essential toolkit for Google Antigravity IDE users. Monitor quotas, manage caches, and visualize system metrics.
viewsContainers.tfa-sidebar.title: Antigravity
views.tfa.sidebar.name: Toolkit
command.openPanel.title: Open Panel
command.showCacheSize.title: Show Cache Size
command.cleanCache.title: Clean Cache
command.refreshQuota.title: Refresh Quota
command.openSettings.title: Open Settings
command.showDisclaimer.title: About
command.restartLanguageServer.title: Restart Agent Service
command.restartUserStatusUpdater.title: Reset Status
command.runDiagnostics.title: Run Connectivity Diagnostics
config.quotaDisplayStyle.classic-donut: Classic Donut: Traditional full circular ring
config.visualizationMode.groups: Group models by category (Gemini, Claude, GPT, etc.)
config.dashboard.10_gaugeStyle.descripti: Choose the visual style for quota display in the sidebar
config.dashboard.20_viewMode.description: Choose between grouped or individual model display in sidebar
config.dashboard.30_historyRange.descrip: Time range for usage timeline chart in minutes (default: 90 minutes)
config.dashboard.50_includeSecondaryMode: Show GPT quota in sidebar (GPT shares quota pool with Claude)
config.status.10_showQuota.description: Show quota information in the status bar
config.status.20_showCache.description: Display Antigravity IDE cache size in the status bar
config.status.30_displayFormat.descripti: Choose how to display quota information in status bar
config.status.40_warningThreshold.descri: Show warning color when quota falls below this percentage
config.status.50_criticalThreshold.descr: Show critical color when quota falls below this percentage
config.system.10_cacheWarningSize.descri: Show warning when cache size exceeds this value in MB
config.system.20_autoClean.description: ⚠️ NOT IMPLEMENTED - Automatically clean cache when it exceeds the warning threshold
config.system.30_hideEmptyFolders.descri: Hide empty folders in Brain and Code Tracker tree views
config.system.40_scanInterval.descriptio: Cache check interval in seconds (minimum: 30s, default: 120s)
config.system.50_serverHost.description: ⚠️ Advanced: Custom server hostname for quota metrics. Default: 127.0.0.1
config.system.60_apiPath.description: ⚠️ Advanced: Custom API endpoint for quota metrics
config.system.99_debugMode.description: Enable debug logging to 'Toolkit for Antigravity' output channel
